original_text: David had said to the Amalekite, ‘You deserve to die because of what you have said. Your own words show that you did a bad thing. You yourself said, “I have killed the Lord's chosen king.” ’
korean_text: 다윗이 그에게 이르기를 네 피가 네 머리로 돌아갈지어다 네 입이 네게 대하여 증언하기를 내가 여호와의 기름 부음 받은 자를 죽였노라 함이니라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: David had said to the Amalekite
because of what you have said
that you did a bad thing
I have killed the Lord's chosen king
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 주님의 기름 부음 받은 왕을 죽였다고
